quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), the 30th Meeting of the Financial Stability and Development Council Sub-Committee was held, the meeting was chaired by ___________.
options: Finance Minister of India
Governor, Reserve Bank of India
CEO, NITI Aayog
Finance Secretary (Ministry of Finance)
Deputy Governor, Reserve Bank of India

quiz.text: The 30th Meeting of the Financial Stability and Development Council Sub-Committee was recently (August 2023) held in Mumbai. In this context, the Financial Stability and Development Council was established by the government in the year__________.
options: December 2007
December 2008
December 2009
December 2010
December 2011

quiz.text: Recently, (September 2023) 603rd meeting of the Central Board of Directors of Reserve Bank of India was held in Indore under the Chairmanship of Shri Shaktikanta Das, Governor. In this context, the normal tenure of Central board directors appointed/nominated by the Government is ________.
options: 2 years
3 years
4 years
5 years
6 years

quiz.text: Recently, (September 2023) 603rd meeting of the Central Board of Directors of Reserve Bank of India was held in _________ under the Chairmanship of Shri Shaktikanta Das, Governor. It reviewed the global and domestic economic situation and associated challenges, including the impact of current global geopolitical developments.
options: Indore
Mumbai
Delhi
Hyderabad
Bangalore

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), the scope of UPI has been expanded by the inclusion of Pre-Sanctioned Credit Lines as a funding account. Currently, which of the following can be linked to UPI?
options: Savings account
Overdraft account
Prepaid Wallets
Credit Cards
All of the above

quiz.text: What is the primary objective of the recent (September 2023) expansion of the scope of the UPI for inclusion of Pre-Sanctioned Credit Lines as a funding account?
options: To make UPI transactions more expensive.
To discourage the use of UPI for financial transactions.
To reduce the cost of financial offerings.
To limit the development of financial products.
To keep the UPI system unchanged.

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), RBI announced that based on an assessment of current and evolving liquidity conditions, it has been decided that the amounts impounded under the I-CRR would be released in stages so that system liquidity is not subjected to sudden shocks and money markets function in an orderly manner. Which of the following Schedules is correctly matched?1. September 09, 2023 ::  25% of the I-CRR maintained2. September 23, 2023 ::  25% of the I-CRR maintained3. October 07, 2023 ::  50% of the I-CRR maintained
options: Only 1
Both 1 and 2
Only 3
None of the above
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently, (September 2023), the Reserve Bank of India informed that ______ of the ₹2,000 banknotes valued at ₹3.32 lakh crore have returned to the banking system after it announced the withdrawal of the high-value currency notes from circulation in May.
options: 90%
91%
92%
93%
94%

quiz.text: According to the recently (September 2023) released press release “Status of withdrawal of ₹2000 denomination banknotes” by the Reserve Bank of India, out of the total banknotes in ₹2,000 denomination received back from circulation, about ______ came in the form of deposits and the remaining around _______ has been exchanged into other denomination banknotes.
options: 87% & 13%
77% & 23%
67% & 33%
57% & 43%
47% & 53%

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), the RBI and BIS Innovation Hub (BISIH) of the Bank for International Settlements, announced the winners of the G20 TechSprint 2023. Accordingly, which of the following are correctly matched? 1. To reduce illicit finance risk :: Knox Networks2. To improve liquidity for emerging market and developing economy currencies in cross-border payments :: Millicent Labs3. To foster multilateral cross-border CBDC platforms :: Secretarium Ltd
options: Only 1
Only 2
Both 1 and 2
Both 2 and 3
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), the RBI and BIS Innovation Hub (BISIH) of the Bank for International Settlements, announced the winners of the G20 TechSprint 2023, all three winning teams were awarded prize money of INR _______ each and felicitated by Governor Shri Shaktikanta Das.
options: 1 million
2 million
3 million
4 million
5 million

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), the Reserve Bank of India issued a press release related to “Release of Movable or Immovable Property Documents on Repayment or Settlement of Personal Loans”. Accordingly, the Regulated entities (REs) must release property documents and remove charges within _________ days after full loan repayment.
options: 10
20
30
45
60

quiz.text: As per the recently (September 2023),  issued press release by the Reserve Bank of India “Release of Movable or Immovable Property Documents on Repayment or Settlement of Personal Loans”, the Regulated entities (REs) must release property documents and remove charges within 30 days after full loan repayment, but in case of delay due to the RE's fault, it will compensate the borrower at a rate of ______ per day.
options: 1,000
2,000
3,000
5,000
6,000

quiz.text: According to the recently (September 2023) released “Census on Foreign Liabilities and Assets of Indian Direct Investment Entities for 2022-23” by the RBI, which of the following countries accounted for 60% of the inward FDI in the country in 2022-23?
options: United states, Mauritius, United Kingdom, Switzerland
United states, Mauritius, United Kingdom and Singapore
United states, Mauritius, United Kingdom, Germany
United states, Mauritius, United Kingdom, France
United states, Mauritius, United Kingdom, South Korea

quiz.text: According to the recently (September 2023) released “Census on Foreign Liabilities and Assets of Indian Direct Investment Entities for 2022-23” by the RBI, in case of overseas direct investment, which of the following countries is not at the top 5 positions?
options: Singapore
United States of America
United Kingdom
Mauritius
Netherlands

quiz.text: The Reserve Bank of India has recently (September 2023), announced the winners of the All-India Quiz on Financial Literacy, 2023, whom among the following duo are winners?
options: Ankit Kumar & Sahil Sharma
Aman Gupta & Utkarsh Sudhakar
Abhishek Sharma & Uday Kapoor
Ayush Aggarwal & Arvind Singh
Sachin Awasthi & Himanshu Thakur

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), the RBI released a list of 15 NBFCs figuring in the 'upper layer' under the scale-based regulation for the financial year 2024, accordingly, which of the following NBFC does not find mention in the list?
options: Indiabulls Housing Finance Limited
L & T Finance Limited
Bajaj Finance Limited
LIC Housing Finance Limited
TMF Business Services Limited

quiz.text: In the context of recently (September 2023), released list of 15 NBFCs in Upper Layer (UL), by the RBI, If NBFCs are once classified as NBFC-UL, enhanced regulatory requirements apply for at least ________ years, regardless of meeting criteria in subsequent years.
options: 6
5
4
3
2

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), the Reserve Bank has released its annual publication titled “Handbook of Statistics on the Indian Economy, 2022-23” (HBS), this publication is ___________ in the series, disseminates time series data on major economic and financial indicators relating to the Indian economy.
options: 27th
26th
25th
24th
23rd

quiz.text: According to the recently (September 2023), released Financial Inclusion Index for March 2023, by the RBI, the Value of the Financial Inclusion Index for March 2023 stands at ________.
options: 60.1
60.5
65.1
65.5
68.1

quiz.text: Consider the following statements regarding the recently (September 2023), released Financial Inclusion Index for March 2023, by the RBI.1. Access parameter of the Index has 20% weightage.2. Usage Parameter of the Index has 45% weightage.3. Quality parameter of the Index has 35% weightage.Which of the following statements is/are correct?
options: Only 1
Only 2
Only 3
Both 1 and 2
Both 1 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), the RBI has released the Financial Inclusion Index for March 2023, accordingly, what is the Base year of the Index?
options: 2020
2021
2022
2023
None of the above
